languages.text: {n}На лице Маражая играют желваки — кажется, попытка расправы все же сумела поколебать его спокойствие. Он тщательно осматривает доспех, явно пострадавший на арене и в недавней драке.{/n}

{n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Маражая играют желваки — кажется, попытка расправы все же сумела поколебать его спокойствие. Он тщательно осматривает доспех, явно пострадавший на арене и в недавней драке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}你看到玛拉斋下巴上的肌肉在不断抽搐，看来他承受的那一击终究还是打乱了他的心绪。他正在仔细检查着他的护甲，很显然，他的护甲在竞技场的角斗以及最后这场战斗中损坏了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你看到玛拉斋下巴上的肌肉在不断抽搐，看来他承受的那一击终究还是打乱了他的心绪。他正在仔细检查着他的护甲，很显然，他的护甲在竞技场的角斗以及最后这场战斗中损坏了。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの顎の筋肉がピクピクしているのが見える…攻撃でバランス感覚を崩すことに成功したようだ。彼は自分の防具をじっくりと検査しているが、アリーナや近頃戦闘で明らかにダメージを受けているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの顎の筋肉がピクピクしているのが見える…攻撃でバランス感覚を崩すことに成功したようだ。彼は自分の防具をじっくりと検査しているが、アリーナや近頃戦闘で明らかにダメージを受けているようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Puedes ver cómo se crispan los músculos de la mandíbula de Marazhai; parece que el ataque ha logrado perturbar su entereza después de todo. Inspecciona cuidadosamente su armadura, que ha sufrido evidentes desperfectos en la arena y el reciente combate.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes ver cómo se crispan los músculos de la mandíbula de Marazhai; parece que el ataque ha logrado perturbar su entereza después de todo. Inspecciona cuidadosamente su armadura, que ha sufrido evidentes desperfectos en la arena y el reciente combate.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez que les muscles maxillaires de Marazhai se contractent de manière répétée. En fin de compte, l'attaque dont il a été victime a tout de même réussi à le déstabiliser. Il inspecte soigneusement son armure endommagée au cours du récent combat livré dans l'arène.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez que les muscles maxillaires de Marazhai se contractent de manière répétée. En fin de compte, l'attaque dont il a été victime a tout de même réussi à le déstabiliser. Il inspecte soigneusement son armure endommagée au cours du récent combat livré dans l'arène.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du siehst, wie Marazhais Kiefermuskeln herumzucken – anscheinend hat der durch den Angriff letzten Endes doch sein Gleichgewicht verloren. Sorgfältig inspiziert er seine Rüstung, da diese beim letzten Kampf in der Arena offensichtlich beschädigt wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst, wie Marazhais Kiefermuskeln herumzucken – anscheinend hat der durch den Angriff letzten Endes doch sein Gleichgewicht verloren. Sorgfältig inspiziert er seine Rüstung, da diese beim letzten Kampf in der Arena offensichtlich beschädigt wurde.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzündeki çene kaslarının titrediğini görebiliyorsun. Görünüşe göre maruz kaldığı saldırı, neticede dengesini bozmayı başarmış. Hem arenada hem de az önceki dövüşte hasar aldığı bariz olan zırhını dikkatle inceliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can see the jaw muscles twitching in Marazhai's face — it seems the attack on him has managed to upset his equilibrium after all. He is carefully inspecting his armour, which has obviously suffered damage in the arena and the recent fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzündeki çene kaslarının titrediğini görebiliyorsun. Görünüşe göre maruz kaldığı saldırı, neticede dengesini bozmayı başarmış. Hem arenada hem de az önceki dövüşte hasar aldığı bariz olan zırhını dikkatle inceliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
